text: I appreciate the enthusiasm of the New
York delegation
it was very disappointing in fact
disgusting because Trump won fair and
square and these other candidates are
stepping up an endorsing Trump and he
wouldn't do it and if he thinks he's
going to run for president in four years
he better think again Ted's not a
politician he doesn't lie
and he says what he says and he's not
gonna lie to the American people if he
doesn't believe that Donald Trump is
going to be good vote your conscience
vote for candidates up and down the
ticket who you trust to defend our
freedom and to be faithful to the
Constitution
joining me is Bob Walker former
congressman of Pennsylvania Bob it was
just electric in that room I mean he was
booed off the stage in your mind was
this an act of sabotage was this a stab
in the back or as Ted Cruz a man of
principle doing what he thought was
right well I think it's a dynamic of a
convention I mean what you have is
people wept whipped into a frenzy and
you come in and you don't follow the
script and the fact is that the
delegates are gonna get very upset about
it the fact is that Donald Trump was
admitted he knew that Ted Cruz was not
going to endorse him last night and laid
him on the stage sample I think people
are saying he can't run his own
convention how is he gonna run the
country well but it may well have been
planned that way is that probably in
terms of the convention they became more
United by Ted Cruz not endorsing Trump
and it leads to tonight when Trump
speech now will be the culmination and
will be the uniting factor for for the
convention they may have been united on
the convention floor but in some ways
didn't Ted Cruz actually address the
real elephant in the room right now
which is the fact that the party is
split across the country there is a lack
of unity in the party yeah but I think
that the reality is that at the
convention that you have a group of
people who are the activists in the
party who are now preparing themselves
to go back and sure that as we move the
campaign forward that the party will be
united look I mean I'm I'm a I'm a John
Kasich advisor I was on I was with the
Kasich campaign and John has not come
out and endorsed the Donald Trump either
I mean a lot of us have concerns about
things that that Donald Trump has said
during the campaign but in terms of last
night I don't think that it changes the
trajectory very much you gotta vote for
Donald Trump how probably you know that
the alternative to me of somebody who
has proven that she puts herself before
the country is is such that I simply
can't vote vote for her so what are your
concerns still then about Donald Trump
what are you hoping to see from home to
know
that's gonna make you feel a little bit
better about giving him your likes I'd
like to know that he is serious about
moving the country in a direction that
makes us a leader in the 21st century
and by that I mean he has to take what
he has described to the American people
and and put it into policy you know so
far he has not made serious policy
proposals he has done basically
headlines what we need from Donald Trump
is is for him to talk seriously about
what the country needs to do to be a
leader in the 21st and are you concerned
about what appears to be his rather
Cavalier approach to foreign policy
making comments almost off-the-cuff
about how he isn't going to stand by
NATO commitments extremely concerned
about that and I mean I think when Newt
Gingrich gave his speech last night in
which he outlined why we were at war
with Isis at the present time and with
radical Islamic terrorism I think that
that made the case that we have to have
a serious program for defeating Isis and
for assuring that the world is united
you know in a war that's being conducted
against us and which we have not yet
fully acknowledged so Donald Trump
tweeting let's just bomb the hell out of
Isis that's not a strategy is that you
want to hear more from him about exactly
what I mean I mean certainly taking
effective military action is one piece
of defeating Isis but it's also true
that Isis is conducting a war you know
social media and there are a whole
series of issues that involve a
defeating radical Islamic terrorism and
bombing may be a piece of that but it's
not it's not a full-blown strategy I've
got to ask you about Mike Pence the
running mate of Donald Trump he almost
appears irrelevant now I mean there are
three moments for the VP candidate and
that is you know the announcement which
was a bit botched the convention he was
massively overshadowed wasn't he by Ted
Cruz well now we've still got the debate
to come no one is talking about Mike
Pence event we're not talking about Mike
Pence today but the fact is I thought
Mike Pence presented himself to the
country very well last night so that if
you have Republicans across the country
who were looking at their vice
presidential candidate
who don't know like pens I think they
came away very very impressed I thought
Mike pens did an absolutely superb job
last night of presenting himself to the
country
